title: Matthew McConaughey On Gun Responsibility | Daily Best of June 8 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Matthew McConaughey weighs in on the gun control debate by advocating for gun responsibility and not allowing the 2nd Amendment to be abused by deranged individuals. ESPN commentator Sarah Spain calls Tampa Bay Rays players bigoted for not wanting to wear rainbow logos. A huge orangutan grabs a man through the bars at an Indonesian zoo and the man barely escapes. Pro-abortion protestors crash a WNBA game causing delays for tens of fans in the audience. Todd and Julie Chrisley, stars of "Chrisley Knows Best," are found guilty of bank fraud and tax evasion. And lastly, we give away over $5,000 to Mercy Deliverance Ministries & Food Bank courtesy of Buffalo Wild Wings!
